title: [MAC] iTunes opens sporadically and I'm forced to afk the match
body:
**if i play windowed the issue isn't there anymore** - fixed

I run mac, which might have something to do with this problem. Whenever I press a button on my headphones (which happens often but accidentally), my iTunes opens up. This has happened twice while playing LoL. When I press this button, my screen shifts from being locked on to the LoL match in fullscreen, to iTunes in fullscreen. My computer is locked into iTunes until the LoL game is over, and I just got a warning about afking during matches from my last match due to this bug. Do I just try to not press the button, or is there anyway to be able to get back to the league screen?

replies.body: It sounds like this issue is with the configuration you have on your Mac launching iTunes when the play button is pressed.  You may need to [contact Apple ](https://support.apple.com/)in this case to assist with that feature, which in turn should stop kicking you out of your games.
